com.camerontec.catalys.core.crypto.util

Class PGPKeyGenApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.core.crypto.util.PGPKeyGenApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cryptix.math.TestPrimeObserver, cryptix.security.rsa.RSAKeyGenObserver, ActionListener, Runnable, EventListener

    public class PGPKeyGenApp
extends Object
implements ActionListener, cryptix.security.rsa.RSAKeyGenObserver, Runnable
    Windowed utility for generating pgp keys and producing key rings for use with the CryptixCrypto class. The code in this utility is based on the source code for the Cryptix encryption engine.

    This is part of the fixCryptix32 Catalys addon.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface cryptix.security.rsa.RSAKeyGenObserver
